mapper.select:
SELECT GOMACODE as "gomacode", STATUS as "status", GOODSOWNERNAME as "goodsownername", DB_NAME as "dbName", CREATEDATE as "createdate", CREATENAME as "createname", GOODSOWNERID as "goodsownerid" FROM T_SYS_OWNERMAPDB
and GOODSOWNERID = #{goodsownerid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_OWNERMAPDB ( GOMACODE, STATUS, GOODSOWNERNAME, DB_NAME, CREATEDATE, CREATENAME, GOODSOWNERID ) VALUES ( #{gomacode, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{goodsownername, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{dbName, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createdate, jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=DateHandler}, #{createname, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{goodsownerid, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_SYS_OWNERMAPDB
GOMACODE = #{gomacode},
STATUS = #{status},
GOODSOWNERNAME = #{goodsownername},
DB_NAME = #{dbName},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate},
CREATENAME = #{createname},
GOODSOWNERID = #{goodsownerid}
GOODSOWNERID = #{goodsownerid}
mapper.select:
SELECT GOMACODE as "gomacode", DB_NAME as "dbName" FROM T_SYS_OWNERMAPDB
and GOMACODE = #{gomacode}
